backend/main.mo: Defines an actor exposing an async hello function that returns a greeting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing architecture, editor features, and rendering logic.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell with tabs and theming wrapped in StartupErrorBoundary and ProModeProvider.
frontend/src/features/docs/ArchitectureP: Documentation screen showing architecture, pipeline, styling, and code examples using tabbed UI.
frontend/src/features/docs/docsContent.t: Static HTML content strings supplying architecture, pipeline, and styling documentation.
frontend/src/features/editor/components/: Error boundary that catches viewport rendering failures and shows a fallback UI with reload and error details.
frontend/src/features/editor/EditorScree: Wraps the editor layout in the EditorStateProvider.
frontend/src/features/editor/export/expo: Provides PNG, JPG, SVG, and WebM animation export utilities using canvas rendering and file downloads.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/B: UI controls for selecting the editor's background mode via a dropdown.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/C: Displays planned camera effect options like depth of field and motion blur, currently disabled and marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/E: Controls bloom, rim lighting, and particle effects with sliders and Pro‑only gating.
Export UI for PNG, JPG, SVG, and animation with resolution selection and Pro restrictions.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/G: Adjusts geometry parameters including extrusion depth, bevel size, and bevel smoothness.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/I: Main inspector layout offering tabs for geometry, material, effects, and export settings plus brand name editing.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/L: UI panel providing sliders and switches to adjust lighting angles, intensity, and shadow settings in the editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/M: Material and style configuration panel with preset selectors, roughness/metalness sliders, and custom texture upload support.
frontend/src/features/editor/inspector/T: Rotation controls for X, Y, Z axes with a reset button updating the logo’s transform state.
frontend/src/features/editor/layout/Edit: Defines the main editor layout with resizable panels for presets, viewport, inspector, and a bottom timeline strip.
frontend/src/features/editor/logo/materi: Generates a THREE.MeshStandardMaterial using style presets, material presets, and optional custom textures.
frontend/src/features/editor/logo/ThreeT: Renders the 3D text logo with dynamic material, rotation, animation, and geometry settings based on editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/LogoViewpor: 3D viewport component handling WebGL checks, context loss, scene setup, post-processing safety, and notifications.
frontend/src/features/editor/presets/Pre: Displays clickable brand style presets that apply predefined visual configurations to the editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/Backg: Renders different background environments—transparent, studio, dark stage, or gradient—based on editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/Light: Creates ambient, directional, and optional rim lighting with dynamic positioning driven by editor settings.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/Parti: Generates animated particle effects with positions and velocities computed from particle intensity settings.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/PostP: Manages Three.js post‑processing with error handling, initializing and configuring an EffectComposer and bloom pass.
frontend/src/features/editor/scene/SafeP: Lazily loads PostProcessing and suppresses failures, rendering nothing if post‑processing is disabled or bloom is off.
frontend/src/features/editor/state/edito: Defines the editor’s global state, defaults, and context provider with update helpers and post‑processing disable logic.
frontend/src/features/editor/texture/Dra: Provides a drag‑and‑drop area that loads dropped image files as custom textures into editor state.
frontend/src/features/editor/timeline/Ti: UI strip for animation controls, allowing play/pause, transform reset, and speed adjustment.
frontend/src/features/editor/webgl/isWeb: Checks browser support for WebGL2 or WebGL1 and logs detection results.
frontend/src/features/pro/FreeVsProPanel: Renders free vs pro plan UI with a demo toggle, pricing cards, and feature comparison.
frontend/src/features/pro/ProModeContext: Simple context managing Pro mode state and toggle functionality.
frontend/src/features/startup/getWebGLDi: Collects and formats WebGL capability and environment diagnostics for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/features/startup/StartupErr: Error boundary that monitors early‑startup errors, filters non‑fatal ones, and captures error details.
frontend/src/features/startup/StartupFal: Displays an error screen on startup failure with reload, cache-clear, and diagnostic detail options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and initializes AuthClient with custom behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode, scrollbars, and global typography/layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, typography, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
